{"name": "Every Day is a Miracle - Jerome Location", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Client Registration and appointments can be done/made digitally now and the verification process can occur in person or over the phone with a member services associate. However, in-person services are still available: on Wednesdays at our main location, 2424 Jerome Ave, from 9a -12p ONLY.

Closed: 
* Thanksgiving week
* Last two weeks of December", "email": "", "url": "https://edmnyc.org/supermarket-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2392 Jerome Avenue", "address_2": "Timothy Dwight Elementary School P.S. 33", "city": "Fordham Heights", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10468", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8611255, "longitude": -73.9017993}, "phones": [{"number": "(347) 618-1162", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on Thanksgiving. Christmas & New Year"}]}
